# Testing RMarkdown and Github

The *code chunk* below performs the following:

-installs necessary libraries
-presents a table with selected details of the 10 Gentoo penguins with the **largest** body mass.

```{r, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(palmerpenguins)

#q2.2
penguins %>%
  select(species, island, bill_length_mm, body_mass_g) %>%
  filter(species == "Gentoo") %>%
  arrange(-body_mass_g) %>%
  slice_head(n = 10) %>%
  knitr::kable()
```
